en: A royal appraiser came to evaluate the value of this painting.
pinyin: yù yòng xīng dìng shī lái píng gū zhè fú zì huà de jià zhí.

en: There is a 鑴 inset in his watch.
pinyin: tā de shǒu biǎo shàng xiāng qiàn le yī méi xī.

en: This golden 鑴 is inset with a gemstone.
pinyin: zhè kuǎn huáng jīn xī zǐ xiāng qiàn le yī kē bǎo shí.

en: I don't need your help, please don't say it again, thank you.
pinyin: Wǒ bù xūyào nǐ de bāngzhù, qǐng bùyào zài shuō le, dǐngxiè.

en: I'm full already, I can't eat your dumplings anymore, thank you.
pinyin: Wǒ yǐjīng chībǎo le, nǐ de jiǎozi wǒ chī bù xià le, dǐngxiè.

en: I don't believe your advice will help me, thank you.
pinyin: Wǒ bù xiāngxìn nǐ de jiànyì huì duì wǒ yǒu bāngzhù, dǐngxiè.

en: Watching delicious food videos made me unable to hold back my drooling!
pinyin: hǎo kàn de měi shí shì pín ràng wǒ bù jìn biāo kǒu shuǐ le!

en: Don't look at your phone for too long, or you might start drooling!
pinyin: bié kàn shǒu jī tài jiǔ, fǒu zé huì biāo kǒu shuǐ de!

en: This dish is made so well that I feel like drooling uncontrollably!
pinyin: zhè dào cài zuò de tài hǎo le, wǒ jiǎn zhí xiǎng yào biāo kǒu shuǐ!

en: Almost all of us now use high speed internet to go online.
pinyin: wǒmen xiànzài jīhū suǒyǒu rén dōu yòng gāosù wǎngluò shàngwǎng.

en: Your computer requires a fast and stable high speed internet to smoothly watch videos.
pinyin: nǐ de diànnǎo xūyào yī zhǒng kuàisù wěndìng de gāosù wǎngluò cáinéng liúchàng de guānkàn shìpín.

en: We have spent a lot of money upgrading our high speed internet and now we can connect multiple devices simultaneously.
pinyin: wǒmen yǐjīng huāle hěn duō qián shēngjí wǒmen de gāosù wǎngluò, xiànzài kěyǐ tóngshí liánjiē duō tái shèbèi.

en: Curiosity killed the weevil.
pinyin: Hǎoqíxīn hài sǐ chǐdù.

en: His teeth are rotten to the core, completely infested with weevils!
pinyin: Tā nà kǒu yá làn de yào sǐ, quán shì chǐdù a!

en: Rats can nibble off weevils and they are highly alert.
pinyin: Lǎoshǔ kěyǐ kè diào chǐdù, érqiě jǐngjué xìng hěn gāo.

en: Life is not merely about having breath and heartbeat, but also about pursuing one's own dreams and goals.
pinyin: Shēnghuó bù jǐn shì yǒu hūxī hé xīn tiào de zhuàngtài, hái xūyào zhuīqiú zìjǐ de mèngxiǎng hé mùbiāo.

en: There are many uncertainties in our lives, but it is important that we learn to cherish each day and be grateful for life.
pinyin: Wǒmen de shēnghuó zhōng yǒu xǔduō bù quèdìng de biànshù, dàn zhòngyào de shì, wǒmen yào xuéhuì zhēnxī měi yītiān bìng duì shēnghuó chōngmǎn gǎnjī.
